info.title: Number of Commits by Team
info.subtitle: Total Commits in Repository by Team
info.description: This guarantee measures the total number of commits made to a specific repository by the entire team over a defined period.
info.example: If a team has made 150 commits to the repository over the last month, this number reflects the team's overall contribution to the project's codebase.
info.moreInfo: Tracking the number of commits helps in understanding the team's activity level and engagement with the project.

info.title: Contribution by Member
info.subtitle: Percentage of Commits by Member
info.description: This guarantee measures the percentage of commits made by a specific team member compared to the total number of commits made by the entire team.
info.example: If a team member has made 30 commits out of a total of 150 commits made by the team, the contribution percentage would be (30/150)*100 = 20%.
info.moreInfo: This metric helps in assessing the active participation of individual team members in the project's development process.
